summary: Free plan limits testing completed. All features verified: Backend enforces 1 chat/day limit (FREE_PLAN_MAX_MATCHES_PER_DAY=1), plan-status endpoint returns correct matches_used_today and matches_limit fields, Premium users have unlimited matches (matches_limit=null). Frontend UI correctly shows '1 chat por día' in Spanish with X/1 counter. All 6 language translations verified in i18n.js.
passed_tests: Backend: plan-status endpoint returns matches_limit=1 for free users
Backend: plan-status endpoint returns matches_limit=null for premium users
Backend: plan-status endpoint returns matches_used_today field
Backend: Downgrade to free restores matches_limit=1
Frontend: SubscriptionSection.js uses MessageCircle icon for chat benefit
Frontend: Usage counter shows 'X / 1' format for chats
Frontend: UI displays '1 chat por día' in Spanish
i18n: ES translation '1 chat por día' verified
i18n: EN translation '1 chat per day' verified
i18n: PT translation '1 chat por dia' verified
i18n: FR translation '1 chat par jour' verified
i18n: DE translation '1 Chat pro Tag' verified
i18n: IT translation '1 chat al giorno' verified
i18n: matchLimitDesc mentions 'chats' in all 6 languages
critical_code_review_comments: All free plan limit features correctly implemented
Backend uses 'matches' terminology internally but frontend shows 'chats' to users
Premium upgrade endpoint is MOCKED (no real Stripe integration)

test_credentials.note: DEV_MODE enabled - OTP codes visible in backend logs

seed_data_creation: Created test user with completed onboarding for UI testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Free plan limits feature fully implemented and tested. Backend enforces 1 chat/day for free users via can_user_create_match() function. Frontend shows '1 chat por día' with X/1 counter in SubscriptionSection. Premium upgrade is MOCKED. All 6 languages have correct translations.

mocked_apis.POST /api/user/upgrade-premium: Directly sets plan to premium without payment verification
